maltcms.datastructures.array
Class PartitionedArray

java.lang.Object
  maltcms.datastructures.array.PartitionedArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IArrayD2Double
public class PartitionedArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements IArrayD2Double

Array, which has been partitioned into rectangular areas, e.g. by anchors. Allows overlap of areas, as well as for neighborhoods around anchors.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
See Also:
Serialized Form
